”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Principle For Smart Living Show is a weekly podcast about faith, growth, excellence, contribution & self-care, which we call the Life Mastery Matrix; faith is about your personal spiritual journey and relationship with God; growth is about your attitude to keep learning and becoming a better person; excellence is about your approach to doing quality work in everything you put out into the world; contribution is about you sharing your gifts and talents to become a blessing to others, and unlock more of your God given capacity and capabilities; and self-care is about you taking care of your body, mind and spirit. Thats the show!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
